name: Career Values Self-Assessment (Notion Template)
description: The Identifying Your Career Values Card Sort is a tool for self-awareness, career planning and self-leadership. It will help you to gain awareness of your values and how they impact your career search and development. You can use it to help you identify what you want from your career, understand better why you are doing certain things, and to reflect on how you might feel about taking certain actions. creator.name: Be Happy Remote by Sam Roberts
